product_name: Merrell Stapelton Stretch Shorts - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Whether you're pushing through underbrush or running to catch a flight, you'll feel invincible in the moisture-wicking, quick-drying Merrell Stapelton Stretch Shorts. Shorts are made for rugged use with stretchy, wicking and quick-drying Opti-Wick(TM) nylon/elastane fabric that keeps you comfortable. Fabric is treated with a durable water repellent finish to repel moisture and stains. With a UPF 20 rating, fabric provides very good protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Standard 5-pocket design, plus a side zippered pocket and side drop-in pocket, provide ample room for stowing essentials. Gusseted crotch and contoured seams allow unrestricted range of motion. Closeout.
short_description: Whether you're pushing through underbrush or running to catch a flight, you'll feel invincible in the moisture-wicking, quick-drying Merrell Stapelton Stretch Shorts.
